name: Fundación ECOLEC
membership: ECOLEC is part of the WEEE-Logic partners Network of different country based EPR systems in different countries
goal:
ECOLEC is an Extended Producer Responsibility System for WEEE (wasted electrical and electronic equipment) management in Spain. The purpose of Ecolec Foundation is to establish the most efficient system for the collection, transport, recycling, recovery and disposal of WEEE and batteries, ensuring the member companies the fulfilment of its obligations in the field of waste management (according with EU Directives and Spanish legislation) and making this task respectfully with the environment.
The Ecolec Foundation is a non-profit organization created by business associations that represent the sector of manufacturers and importers of large and small appliances. Our objectives are to contribute to the maintenance and improvement of natural resources through the collection, treatment, recovery and disposal of waste electrical and electronic equipment (WEEE), batteries and accumulators, and of course, actively participate in the task of environmental awareness to the citizens, promote the Sustainable Development and to be a key element of the Circular Economy
euInitiatives:
Circular Economy Package
- amending Directive 2008/98/EC on waste
- amending Directive 1999/31/EC on the landfill of waste
- amending Directive 94/62/EC on packaging and packaging waste
- amending Directives 2006/66/EC on batteries and accumulators and waste batteries and accumulators, and 2012/19/EU on waste
electrical and electronic equipment
